TopicTitle: KSP 1.04 Where are the contracts in career mode?

Articles.Content: Whenever I start a career save, I get no contracts to start with. Nothing. Nada. Zip. Bupkiss. Zero. They never ever show up under any circumstances whatsoever. I've deleted save after save and I'm THIS CLOSE to just going back to sandbox and giving up entirely forever on any career mode. WHAT AM I DOING WRONG HERE?????

Well, for one, posting this in General discussion instead of Support.

Do you have mods? If so, post in modded support. (And there was conflict that causes this with contract configurator AND Texture Replacer's default configuration AND mods that have .dds flags instead of .png, which is fixed by installing Active Texture Management).
Argh, you're right. I posted this in the wrong forums. Should/Can I get someone to move this to support?
